title: Computer Science Student
subtitle: Aswan University
description: Explored a diverse range of computer science topics, including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
Honed problem-solving skills and critical thinking when tackling complex technical challenges.
Gained practical experience through coding assignments, software development, and participation in hackathons, applying theory to real-world problems.
Engaged in research projects in areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cybersecurity, deepening understanding of cutting-edge technologies.
Benefited from a supportive academic community, learning from dedicated professors, collaborating with peers, and attending enriching seminars and workshops.

title: Software Engineering Scholar
subtitle: ALX Software Engineer Program
description: My journey with ALX's Software Engineer Program has been immersive and transformative, propelling me into the tech world.
I've mastered algorithms, data structures, and programming languages, sharpening my problem-solving and critical thinking skills daily.
Hands-on projects, coding sprints, and real-world applications have honed my expertise beyond theory.
I've explored frontiers in AI, cloud computing, and cybersecurity, fostering innovation and creativity.
Within a global community of learners and mentors, I've shared knowledge and forged lasting connections.
Approaching graduation, I'm poised to unleash the power of code on the world, driven by ALX's technical prowess and a passion for innovation.
